Package walker.easydb.exception

Class Summary
DB2ErrorLocator Locator of database error, it translates the error code of DB2 into unified error type.
ErrorLocator Locator of database error, it translates the error code of different database into unified error type.
MysqlErrorLocator Locator of mysql error, it points out the detail error message.
OracleErrorLocator Locator of database error, it translates the error code of Oracle into unified error type.
 

Exception Summary
BaseException Superclass of all self-defined exception class.
CriteriaException This Excepion throwed when builds the criteria sub-sentence of the sql.
DataAccessException This Excepion may be throwed when operating, accessing the permanent data.
FileAccessException This Excepion may be throwed when accessing the disk file.
IllegalEntityException This Excepion throwed if the definition of BaseEntity is illegal.
IllegalParamException 如果方法的参数值不满足要求, 则抛出此异常.
